transArray.content: Opposite this store is Metro Line 6. It is very convenient to go to Nanluoguxiang or travel to other places. It saves you having to take a taxi back and forth. The location is very good.

Dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is only 500 meters away from Haidian Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6. There is a bus stop at the door. Travel routes You can make various choices according to your travel mode, which is convenient and fast. At the same time, the room is fully equipped with electric curtains, refrigerated small refrigerator, and snacks and fresh oranges are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories. Sincerely Looking forward to your every visit! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
